markdown.markdown:
Below are projects I have completed that **showcase key skills in programming and design**. 

*Image next to each project description too small? Click on it to see an enlarged version!*





::::: {.columns}

::: {.column}

Here I used the **human-centered design process** to redesign the personal grooming process for a specific user. Click [here](HCD-skin-care/) to learn about each stage of the process.

**In this project I showcase** the process of:

* Empathizing
* Defining 
* Ideating
* Prototyping
* Testing

:::

::: {.column}

![](HCD-skin-care/images/HCD-skin-care-KG/HCDDP14243.jpg){.lightbox}

:::

In a team of 3 students, I **prototyped, tested, and designed a web application** to help users understand sound through shifting and mixing colors. Learn more [here](MUSE/). 

**In this project I showcase:**

* Wireframing in Figma
* Understanding user flows

## Gradescope Calendar

::::: {.columns}

::: {.column}

Here, I collaborated with 2 computer science students to create a web application to help students plan for assignments. I **designed the UI** for the site and **programmed the "Weekly Assignments" page.** Learn more [here](gradescope-cal/). 

**In this project I showcase:**

* Experience in website development
* UI design in Canva
* Collaboration skills 

:::

::: {.column}

![](gradescope-cal/images/GCalWeeklyV2.png){.lightbox}

:::

:::::
